text: hananimkkeseo geudaedeul-ege geumhan geos-eun danji, jong-gyoleul iyulo geudaedeulgwa ssawossgo geudaedeul-ui geojujilobuteo geudaedeul-eul chubanghayeoss-eumyeo geudaedeul-ui chubang-eul dowassdeon jadeul-eul gyoulo duneun geos-ila. geudeul-eul gyoulo duneun ja, jeodeul-eun sillo budanghan jadeul-ila
